website_summaries.verdict: Unsurpassed quality and protection. A premium case loved by many.
pros: Port plugs keep dust and dirt out
cons: Adds a bit of bulk to your phone

customer_reviews.title: Sent a FAKE
customer_reviews.text: Sent me a fake OtterBox. I could tell as soon as I opened it. The outside rubber is more of a hard plastic and it says OTR COM (otter commuter) on the inside. The real otter boxes say OTR DEF. Totally disappointed. Definitely not keeping this. Don’t spend your money on this. If you want a fake OtterBox, you can spend $10. False advertisement. Amazon should really be on top of this.
customer_reviews.author: Casey B.

customer_reviews.title: Hideous.
customer_reviews.text: Otterbox makes solid cases but you're really paying for their unparalleled warranty and customer service. That said, they can't seem to hire a decent photographer. Colors aren't even close. Big hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Some Guy

customer_reviews.title: Not Authentic. Counterfit
customer_reviews.text: I buy these all the time for my business and these are not authentic cases at all. When I compare them the original Otter boxes you can tell the difference especially in the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: IT Des Plaines

customer_reviews.title: Outer skin issues
customer_reviews.text: Yes, the case is robust and offers excellent protection from drops. The black silicone outer shell started loosening around the lower edge, and the entire backside, after 7 months of daily use in and out of pockets/purse/bags. I thought the first time it happened that it was a fluke. However the second brand new outer cover did the same exact thing.
customer_reviews.author: J. Welch

customer_reviews.title: Had the product for a few weeks. I accidentally ...
customer_reviews.text: Had the product for a few weeks. I accidentally dropped my iPhone on our hardwood floors and the glass fractured; impact point was on the side. Called OtterBox and they wouldn't cover the glass. However, they did offer to provide me with another OtterBox ? Why would I need another Otter Box unless the one I had was defective and, if so why wouldn't they simply pay for the glass replacement. Not the experience I was expecting based on the raved reviews.
customer_reviews.author: rwp

customer_reviews.title: Pretty But Doesn't Hold Up
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my daughter in November and in no time at all it was peeling and falling apart.I thought maybe it was just a bad one and ordered another in April and within a week it was doing the same thing. I bought Teal both times don't know if it is only that color or all of these but I Wouldn't recommend buying this case!
customer_reviews.author: K. Gerber

customer_reviews.title: Excellent case with one easy to fix design flaw
customer_reviews.text: This case will protect your phone extremely well. The only flaw is the built in plastic cover scratches very easily. And will become annoying within a month or two depending on your environment. I simply tore the biult in plastic screen protector off and used some goof off to remove the sticky residue it's like a new case now. I already had a tempered glass protector on to begin with...which I would recommend even with the case since dust can get between the two. The only other issue I've had with otterbox products is the cases stretch out over time from taking off for cleaning. I've had mine for over a year now and it is still functioning fine.
customer_reviews.author: D.Man

customer_reviews.title: The screen cover won’t last
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a sturdy case, but the screen on the case doesn’t last long. I have an office job and am pretty careful with my phone, but my screen is already scratched to the point where it distorts the image in some places. I’ve only had it 7 months. Glass screen protector and a different case would probably be your best bet. Or buy a glass screen protector and rip the flimsy one out of this case, which is what I will probably do.
customer_reviews.author: Cha Loo

customer_reviews.title: Defender + iPhone 6 Not a Good Combination
customer_reviews.text: Let me start with the good...the phone is well protected. Now for the bad. The bulkiness of the case and the way that it is designed makes it almost impossible for people to hear me when I am talking on the phone. It is very frustrating. Then to make matters worse the built in screen protector lets in moisture and air bubbles, which then makes the touch screen unable to work properly. You must pop off the whole case of, which is not easy, and then clean both sides and then try again. I have loved my other Otterbox cases but the relationship between the iPhone 6 and the Otterbox Defender is not working.
customer_reviews.author: Reading Mom

customer_reviews.title: Prevents touchscreen from working.
customer_reviews.text: It seems to protect my iPhone very well but after turning on the phone, the touchscreen doesn't respond and then I notice a gap between the protector and the screen that prevents my screen from working.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Good for dropping, bad for water protection.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this almost one year ago (Feb 4). It worked well to protect the phone at first, but for the last four months, water has been seeping in to the case. You can see the water pooling under the plastic screen cover. I think it's coming in from the home button area (which hasn't let me use touch unlock for the past 6 months). Thankfully it hasn't caused any lasting damage to my phone, but I'm forced to buy another case. Happy with protection from dropping, but unfortunately can't risk the water damage. Was hoping this case would last longer than one year. Probably won't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: weedy4u

customer_reviews.title: Trust an Otter Box
customer_reviews.text: My husband lost his phone while feeding the cattle. Snowing, big round bale, lots of big cows. Tried calling it. Nothing. Waited three days. Looked everywhere he could think of. Figure it'll show up some day. Doubt it will be in usable condition. But...it is in an OtterBox after all. Called insurance. Received phone. Put another OtterBox Defender on it. They are very sturdy, easy to handle, come with a holster. I ordered the used, good as new. Really was. Looks great. Package was in rough shape. Who cares?! Not putting the box on the phone!
customer_reviews.author: STAR STRUCKTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price on a case that is normally around 50 ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price on a case that is normally around 50 dollars. This will definitely take drops and bumps. I had a simple clear silicone/soft plastic on before and it didn't protect my screen from the fall from my truck at 35 mph (stupid on my part for leaving it there). Now with screen replaced I am confident that this will take bumps and drops. I also put a Zagg Sapphire Defense screen protector on it and removed the Otter Box plastic one that is built into the case, which was easy. Phone is safe now I figure.
customer_reviews.author: John Speier

customer_reviews.title: lower left problem
customer_reviews.text: I have had several defenders on various phones and swear by them, but for some reason this case with the iphone six just didn't allow the use of the buttons in the lower left of the screen. Returned and ordered a second which was slightly better but too frustrating. Returning that one and buying a commuter. As an aside, I tried a lifecase for this phone but it fell apart quickly and was in the trash in a few weeks. Otterbox will still be my go-to brand.
customer_reviews.author: jay plain

customer_reviews.title: Nice case, but doesnt fit Charger and Fingerprint Scanner Unusable
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this case but I don't. The color is great and it seems very protective but I ran into some issues. First, my car charger does not fit into the slot where the charging port is. The area is too narrow and therefore I'd have to buy a new charger. Secondly, this case interferes with the fingerprint log in capabilities of the phone. I have fairly small hands/fingers and 8/10 times the fingerprint scanner could not read my fingerprint when using this case. This case just doesn't work for me at all.
customer_reviews.author: R. Austin

customer_reviews.title: I count on Otterbox
customer_reviews.text: I love the durability of the Otterbox Defender series of cases. This is the eighth phone I have purchased a Defender case for. The case does a great job of keeping dust and debris from working its way under the screen protector. This case for the iPhone 6 has been the best so far at staying clean on the inside. The only problem I have had with the case is that the cover over the lightning port is a little too stiff. It takes an actual effort to bend it far enough back to be able to plug in the charge cord.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy C Walker

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Case
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying this product, I am seriously clumsy so I need a heavy duty case. I have dropped this case numerous times and it does its job protecting my phone. My only complaint is that if it rains, or my phone gets wet it is extremely difficult to open the case, and the water actually get trapped inside. Once water is inside you are unable to utilize the touch screen, and I can only imagine what type of damage it may cause in the long run. So it has it's pros and cons.
customer_reviews.author: Drea

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective Protection
customer_reviews.text: The case failed to protect my phone, and I just found out from the customer support at Otterbox that they do not cover any damage to phones, only damage to the actual case. What the crap is that? It's our fault for not exploring the details of the policy; however, the policy stinks for a couple reasons. 1. If the case fails to protect my phone, why would I want another ineffective case? 2. If the case fails to protect my phone, and I no longer have a phone, then why do I need a new case? Not cool, Otterbox.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Poor performance, serious disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: By reputation, the product was perceived to be an industry-best but has failed miserably to achieve that level of performance. The case allows excessive dust inside, requiring frequent disassembly, cleaning, then careful reassembly. The fingerprint reader was fine for a short time, but a couple of months use and it rarely works. The final straw was the recent breaking off of the carrier clip. This product might be perfect if you're an office pogue but fails when exposed to any activities similar to outdoor recreation or construction industries.
customer_reviews.author: Shoot-N-Ride

customer_reviews.title: Kid proof
customer_reviews.text: With two little ones my phone sustains more abuse than normal :) But this cover has worked great for me even after an year of buying it. My phone has fallen a million times, it sustained falling on hard surfaces, falling from heights, you name it and despite all this no damage whatsoever. Occasionally the finger print reader doesnt work that great but I just remove the cover clean it really well and let it dry an hour or so before I put it back on and it works every single time. I thought it was a bit expensive initially but think it is okay to spend once instead of spending redundantly to buying a new one!
customer_reviews.author: Gators

customer_reviews.title: Husband & kid tested / thrifty wife approved
customer_reviews.text: Durable, easy to put on & take off. Because this is for husband he would have liked a black with gun-grey color combo insteas of this regular grey. When his case is face up you cant tell the diference between other otter boxes. He regularly grabs our daughters phone by mistake & its a slight frustration (her otterbox is pink camo) but other then that it's the device protection he needs. This phone is droped on gravel, cement, construction equipment & has stood the drop test where other cases have failed.
customer_reviews.author: 2am Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Beware of a good deal
customer_reviews.text: The OtterBox Defender came assembled and I was unable to separate the 2 parts to install it on my phone. VERY frustrating. I watched the YouTube video that OtterBox has for installation and it is deceivingly easy in the video. There was no way I could separate the parts without using pliers and destroying the box. After 30 minutes my frustration level was so high that I decided to return the item. Shouldn't be that difficult. I've owned OtterBoxes for each iPhone I've purchased and never had difficulty with installation. Now I know why this was only $20 and not $60! I will go to a local office store to buy one that I know will work.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy C.

customer_reviews.title: Great protection but vibrant color got grungy fast
customer_reviews.text: I am a steadfast otterbox defender fan. I drop my phone at least twice a day every day. Otterbox defender protection is worth the extra bulk to me. My only complaint on this is I’ve had it only 3 months and it looks like I’ve had it a year. The teal discolors easily so the edges have a darkness to them. Kind of the color of pencil lead. I tried to magic eraser it off but no luck. the vibrancy is gone and it looks grimey. I’ll probably use it until it wears out which will likely be another year and a half, but I’m bummed the color didn’t stay bright and it looks worn. Edit: pictures added
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Cheap insurance.
customer_reviews.text: Price is cheaper than the number of iPhones I would have broken. Fingerprint reader is spotty at best especially if it’s humid or if a drop of water gets under the case. I’ve dropped my phone down stairs, onto concrete, stone, pavement, you name it and my phone is still 100% intact. These tend to last about 2 years before the thin plastic over the home button tears and the covers for the charger and headphone ports become difficult to use. Gets 5 stars because my phone is still going after 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: rM

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This case is really good, it has a great resistance, however sometimes the fingerprint reader fail recognizing the fingerprint but that’s no a big problem, it’s durability is very good so you can keep this case for years and will still good, therefore I recommend
customer_reviews.author: Dayana E.

customer_reviews.title: Lousy product
customer_reviews.text: This product is suppose to protect your phone! Well, I dropped my iphone (inside, nothing dramatic) and the front glass shattered--while it was properly in its OtterBox! I just called OtterBox and found out their warranty is for if the case breaks, not if your phone breaks. What is the point of spending all this money on a protective cover if a) your $800 phone still breaks and b) they don't stand behind their product?! Will never buy or recommend this protect again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Woodside

customer_reviews.title: NOT In the original packaging -Had to pay return shipping and a restock fee
customer_reviews.text: This item came in a generic looking cardboard box with an Otterbox Logo -NOT the one you see in the stores. So, I did not even bother opening it up. I did have to pay return shipping costs and a 10% restock fee to return it - what's more in their fine print they can charge you more of a restock fee for other conditions met/unmet. If it is new -it should be in the original packaging -THAT is how they come from the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: J-101

customer_reviews.title: so strong and sturdy I could hardly open it
customer_reviews.text: My Otter Box Defender arrived today, again in an envelope. My suggestion is a box. The envelope was torn in two places however the bubble side of the envelope was not puntured or torn. The original OtterBox Depender wrapping/box was intact, so strong and sturdy I could hardly open it. Thanks Otter box. I love my otterbox case. This is my third one. I occassionaly drop my iphone, but no worries with otterbox
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia M Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Screen of low quality
customer_reviews.text: In 6 weeks, the Home Button became non-functional for Touch ID due to a blister in the protector where it stretched & formed a bubble. Update I found out I could use the Otterbox warranty. I first ordered the wrong thing, then ordered what I thought would be a screen, then realized that was also the wrong thing and finally ordered the right thing. Otterbox sent ALL. Now I am the one who has taken advantage of Otterbox. Dear Otterbox, please forgive. Your followup service was above anything I expected.
customer_reviews.author: RJD

customer_reviews.title: Strong case
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Tough and durable, plus the rubber casing helps it not fall out of your pocket. It is a bit beefy, but it’s worth it for the extra support. there is a little resistance on the power buttons and volume buttons, but not enough to really bother me. I used it on an iphone 8 despite it being for the 6, but it still worked fine. The case was so protective that i felt comfortable throwing my phone around and had no fear of any damage to it. It comes with this plastic screen protector on the case that i found makes it difficult to use the phone perfectly, but it is easily removed.
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: Seems like it will provide a lot of protection, but a bit clunky
customer_reviews.text: I highly suggesting watching the YouTube instructions for installing the case. After failing to get the outer part of the case to come off for 10 minutes I decided to look up instructions and was able to get it apart right away. The case fits the phone really well, and the tabs don’t seem to interfere with charging the phone like they do with some cases. The case does make the phone pretty bulky, but it’s worth it for the protection.
customer_reviews.author: Katy G.

customer_reviews.title: Outlasts everything - a true defender
customer_reviews.text: Had this to protect my iPhone for nearly 2 years and it worked wonders, especially while traveling. And TBH, while dealing with a frustrating long-distance relationship. With a Frenchman .... A.K.A. : I may have thrown my phone across the room once or twice ... three...four times.... and not a scratch on it! I have to say- absolutely worth it! Quite honestly, it outlasted my phone (you know how Apple is w/older models once they release new phones- “software failures”...) and my relationship. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mich

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived fast and intact. Great case for protecting phone but after time the screen protector and fingerprint reader causes some issues. The screen protector will stick and cause some issues like unwanted scrolling and clicks going unregistered. Also the fingerprint reader cover will sometimes not register fingerprint. I’ve taken the case off to test if it was my phone and it most definitely was not my phone. Still overall a great product that I recommend if you don’t mind being slightly frustrated. I’m giving it 3 stars because of the screen protector and fingerprint reader issues.
customer_reviews.author: Shayna

customer_reviews.title: Great product!  Difficult to take apart when getting ready to put your phone in it.
customer_reviews.text: It was really really hard to separate the white plastic piece from the teal blue rubber piece when taking it apart to. After going through several videos online which all made this look effortless and trying not to scratch any part of it, I was getting ready to send it back when I came across a video that suggested using a butter knife to separate these 2 pieces. It worked like a charm! But that advice should be in the Otterbox video that is suggested in the packaging. No where does it say this.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Chicago

customer_reviews.title: A Must
customer_reviews.text: This is a must if you live in the real world. The commuter is good but can't really help on a face down drop. The only thing I do when I get these is I remove the clear plastic built in screen protector. If you want a screen protector then put your own on the screen and skip the built in one (I recommend glass). All the built in one will do it get dirt under it and scratch your screen anyway. Just make sure after you remove it to make sure all the glue tape it removed as well. I just run my phone with no screen protector and everything is fine.
customer_reviews.author: N8 - Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Otterbox Defender is the ONLY case I trust to use with my expensive iPhone.
customer_reviews.text: My Otterbox Defender has been virtually indestructible. I have dropped my phone onto the concrete from several feet up numerous times and not a scratch to the phone. I finally had to replace my Defender after 3 years from wear and tear, although, it may have been fine but was starting to look nasty from all the drops and dirt that accumulates. I would never purchase any cell phone case for my pricey iPhone other than the Otterbox Defender.
customer_reviews.author: Smile

customer_reviews.title: OtterBox Rocks!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the grip on the OtterBox. I altered mine! I took the screen off as it wasn't registering with my phone. My phone was whacking out! Then I cut the case that covers the volume, charging and aux. I didn't like how my cord bends when it's being charged or when I had a jack cord. I have to replace it too much. So I did away with it! The case is strong and I am glad I re-bought another one because I was able to alter it to fit my needs!
customer_reviews.author: Thumbs-Up!!

customer_reviews.title: Interfered with Touch ID to the point of uselessness
customer_reviews.text: The actual case is good. It is sturdy, easy to put on the phone and has kept my phone nice and protected. BUT my touch id no longer works. I have cleaned the window that is meant to allow touch id to function and reset all my fingers through the window but it will not work now that I have my case on. This worked fine for a couple of weeks, but after some time this window has been scratched or damaged somehow that it interferes with this function. It is beyond annoying as I use touch id for all my passwords.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie L.

customer_reviews.title: The only thing he has ever mentioned that he doesn't like is that the rubber is kind of "sticky" and ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a phone case for my 13 year old son's new phone. He really likes the color and the case has protected his phone very well. The only thing he has ever mentioned that he doesn't like is that the rubber is kind of "sticky" and makes it hard to take the phone out of his pocket. While the rubbery coating makes it less "slippery" when holding it, it also makes it harder to get in and out of pockets! Our family has used OtterBox cases for years and we have not found any cases that we like as well for the protection they give. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and I love the protection the case provides
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case for my tween son after he was given a hand-me down 6s. He loves the belt clip, which features a turn and lock clip, and I love the protection the case provides. The black color makes the case look sleek despite its bulkiness. Otterbox provides the best protection compared to other cases, and although it does cover the beauty of the iPhones, it's a necessary purchase for iPhones in my household given that one fall could ruin a caseless phone. It's also affordable given that Apple has released so many phones since the 6/6s.
customer_reviews.author: Edgewood

customer_reviews.title: Great case.....BAD screen protector
customer_reviews.text: I love Otterbox Defender cases but the screen protector fits too loose against the screen. I still kept it and just cut out the clear plastic screen cover and installed my own screen protector right on the phone. But I think Otterbox could have fixed that problem by now. They've known about it a long time. I should not have to buy an additional screen protector after buying the case too. That's why I gave it a four star rating.
customer_reviews.author: David C. Reich

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This case is worth way more than what they sell it for I love my case and I definitely will use this seller again the screen is easy to use with this case on and the buttons are easy to use as well I’ve dropped my phone atleast 5 times since I’ve had this case on and I can say that it does exactly what it says it will do PROTECT
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I love otterbox. It was worth the money for me to buy the brand name because I drop my phone a lot and have already had to have had the screen replaced in the background. The durability of the case is fantastic and I like the slimness of this case. Usually, I find protective cases too bulky to hold because I have smaller hands, but this is perfect. I got all black and it looks great. If you want to protect your phone, otterbox is the only way to go. Invest for quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy the SCARLETT/GREY one if you want RED.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the SCARLETT/GREY case for my son. My entire family has used Otterbox's Defender cases for several years now. Generally they are very protective and stylish cases. This case is too big for his iPhone6S, you can hear it rattle in the case when he moves the case. And it is PINK, at least CORAL colored not the red pictured here.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Alder

customer_reviews.title: Awful phone case!
customer_reviews.text: Awful product! I am not using it. Put it in I phone 6 for one day and the case blocks areas on the screen so I am unable to reach areas important to touch on the screen then the other touch screen areas you can reach.,. Well the cover film blocks the ability to type so I had to push very hard to type the letters. I really like the look of the case off my phone but can not use it on my phone at all. Put my old case back on and I really appreciate my incipio older case after attempting the change to a new otter box
customer_reviews.author: Cturnn

customer_reviews.title: OtterBox is a must with my 11 year old son
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 11 year old son because he kept dropping his iPhone. The case was tricky to get it apart when we were first trying to get it on his phone. But then when we figured out what we were doing it wasn't that bad lol. Works great and he has not had any issues that I know of with the touch screen etc. I like that I don't have to keep buying screen protectors because this has a cover built in.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Great for my camping trip
customer_reviews.text: I was using a different case for my iPhone, but thought I needed something more rugged for an upcoming camping trip. The case is a proper fit for my iPhone 6, and I recommend checking out videos available on YouTube for instructions on how to fit it in. The case is understandably chunky and adds weight, compared to what I had before. When I dropped it a couple of times, the phone/case to the force, and I have no doubt it would've shattered in any other case. My only frustration is with using TouchID, where the protective covering makes reading my thumbprint less reliable.
customer_reviews.author: G MTop Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: belt clip broke within 2 weeks of using it.
customer_reviews.text: The belt clip broke within 2 weeks of using it. Tried to get warranty thru Outterbox. The web site says to go to the place I bought it. I tried but cannot find anywhere to ask about getting a replacement belt clip. Very disappointed with this one. I have used Outterbox cases for years. This is the first time I have ever had any type of problem with a case. All my other ones have worked great until they were just worn out.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Turn Your Phone into a Tonka Truck!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: The included beltclip and holster breaks easily. Be mindful of this before you sit down in a car or other places when it's mounted on your hip! This is not a case. It’s a TANK! Just getting this thing opened to insert my phone proved how tough and durable it is. Use your phone without fear. This ain’t waterproof, so do keep it away from the wet stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Bragg

customer_reviews.title: good protection for yor phone
customer_reviews.text: It will protect my phone no doubt. But the first week I had it it was hooked to my belt with with the belt clip an when I sat down in a chair the phone case hooked the arm of the chair and the clip broke off. That left an ugly bump on the back of the case, which I tried to remove with a hacksaw and a grinder. I don't look too good but now it will slide in and out of my pocket without catching on the clip bump that was there after th clip broke.
customer_reviews.author: bushwacker

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic case, a different feel then the older Otterbox models. No annoying rubbery grip, this one feels solid. It feels like I have to legit try to drop my phone with this case as opposed to the slipper older otterbox. It's clean, and I like it. Especially when I removed the annoying flimsy screen protector it came with and the button area. Now I can type. I also purchased the Otterbox Alpha glass for my iphone 6. Fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Rain

customer_reviews.title: Durable Case
customer_reviews.text: The Otterbox cell phone case was exactly what I was looking for. I use to have the lifeproof nud. I work as a land Surveyor and there is plenty of dust or times when I need to use my phone. I have dropped it a few times and there has been no damage to my phone. I highly recommend this case to anyone who works in harsh elements. The price was perfect and delivered in two days.
customer_reviews.author: Duey

customer_reviews.title: Chinese Version of the actual thing
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t give this 5 stars because I bought the official otterbox defender case before this one, and after comparing the two I really realized this is a Chinese clone product of the actual thing. Not only is it made in a different place than the official otterbox, but the volume and power buttons are extremely hard to press. On the flip side, my fingers are getting much stronger from trying to lock my phone so much!
customer_reviews.author: SubZeroSki

customer_reviews.title: Tough - great protection for your iPhone 6s
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved OTTER BOX products. This was purchased as a gift for my son's phone before he took possession of it. LOL He has dropped his phone on concrete and asphalt and no damage at all to the phone. The case will get scuffed if you drop it on a rough surface but that is it's job! To take the damage instead of your phone! I will continue to purchase OTTER BOX products as they are very dependable at keeping any phone safe!
customer_reviews.author: Bill R Littlejohn

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been a loyal customer of the brand, and it’s never let me down, day to day and a few very intense situations. Otterbox has kept my 6s safe since the day I bought it new when it was released. And compared to my peers, I’ve never had to replace a screen or had chipped metal. I’ve even dropped my phone in running engine bays, and gravel lots, it’s a tough case. The only con I can state about this case in particular is the openings leave space for dirt to get into the case, but a routine cleaning every other week/month will reduce damage caused by the dirt getting trapped.
customer_reviews.author: carebear

customer_reviews.title: The thing I would recommend is that people get the glass cover
customer_reviews.text: I've had this case almost a year and it is going strong for the most part. I had to have my nephew put on the case. The thing I would recommend is that people get the glass cover, not the plastic one, though my phone screen hasn't shattered yet. It is a bit too bulky for my liking, but it's hard to complain about that. The back of the case has come loose, though I'm not sure why as I've never dropped the phone. I'd recommend it to anyone who doesn't mind having a bulkier and heavier case.
customer_reviews.author: J.E.

customer_reviews.title: I like the protection and the substantial feel of the otter ...
customer_reviews.text: This protected my phone from many many drops and falls until I left my phone on the hood of my car and it shot into heavy traffic. Can't blame the otter box for that one! I bought a new otter box for the next phone immediately. I like the protection and the substantial feel of the otter box. The color is bright so I can find it when I lay it down in the wrong place which I do often! obviously!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Knitter

customer_reviews.title: Love this case for the protection!
customer_reviews.text: Love the Otterbox Defender series.....Dropping my phone at least a couple of times a week, I never worry about damage with this case. Been using them since iPhone 4 days and wouldn't think of another case for protection. Not the most elegant or beautiful, or thinnest but if you want protection (including screen protector which I consider important...to me at least), you can't go wrong with this case
customer_reviews.author: RonS

customer_reviews.title: very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product. It has protected my phone from various drops and bumps. The case is non-slip so it doesn't slide out of my backpocket, which is very important to me since that's where it is most of the time. Couldn't be more pleased UNLESS the same product came in orange and blue! GO GATORS!! But it doesn't, so the two different blues are okay. :o)
customer_reviews.author: Marie T.

customer_reviews.title: I’m 100% happy with my new Otter Box Defender.
customer_reviews.text: I love Otter Box phone cases. My previous one lasted many years and successfully endured multiple falls & drops. I dropped my phone one too many times and completely broke my old case so I had to buy a new one. My expectation is that my new Otter Box Defender will protect my phone through years of inadvertent abuse. I had to YouTube how to put the case on but it’s very easy. Oh, and buying the case on Amazon is waaay cheaper than buying it at the Verizon store (duh!) .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid and well priced
customer_reviews.text: My old case and cover started disintegrating. I looked at several new ones on Amazon. The Otterbox was my choice and I’m delighted. It’s solid and came with a screen cover. Only issue was installation but YouTube has a great video that made it easy. Much better protection than the sketchy one T-Mobile hustled me into (for more money) Only problem is charging port cover. It pushes down on the plug and stops the charging. Good chance I will razor cut that sucker out of the case Buy this case!
customer_reviews.author: DanG

customer_reviews.title: Big and bulky and doesn't seem any more secure
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this and the COMMUTER and ended up returning this one. I don't think it would protect the phone any better than the COMMUTER but it's a lot bigger and bulkier. The built-in screen protector seems sturdy but as others have noted the button cover is very flimsy plastic film.
customer_reviews.author: YR

customer_reviews.title: Fine, but not great
customer_reviews.text: This case is a bit difficult to put on, which is only a problem if you plan to take it on and off. The plastic that covers the home button ripped almost immediately (within a few days) so it's no longer waterproof, but since there's some plastic still, fingerprint unlock doesn't work either. It also makes the screen very dark, so even with maximum brightness its still very hard to see on a sunny day (in fairness, that happens with lots of cases. It does seem very durable so if drops and such are your concern, it's probably a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Anyone!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent overall quality
customer_reviews.text: Designed for the action people, very secure holding, excellent overall quality. Only con for me is the large round hole for the Apple logo, kind of childish thing, I use a black thin cloth to cover it. Seems to me absurd that you make such a hole (1-1/4 inch diameter) showing everybody (including thieves) that you are carrying an iPhone. Hey Otterbox team, we adults also use phones, and it is really ridiculous this hole, besides being a good dust and grime collector. Last comment: The cradle survived 11 months, and the Otterbox's website does not honore warranty unless you bought it from them.
customer_reviews.author: Swordsman

customer_reviews.title: I look like a tourist but I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I'm a klutz, but now my phone doesn't suffer from it. No more cracked screens, no more falling out of pockets, less frequent forgetting to carry my phone. The case is extremely tough, mostly keeps out mild rain, and comes with a wonderful belt holster. It's a very nice color and allows charging port, sound port, and camera access while in use, though not all portable chargers can fit through its openings.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Finally an otterbox that won't rip out my hair.
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the old otterboxes. The old one had rubber grips on the edges that would pull my hair out. This one has the perfect amount of textured grip, but won't tear out your hair. It's pretty hard to get off / take apart. But that's probably a good thing. I'm able to use my phone in the rain and keep my phone totally dry. I haven't and won't try submerging it, but I'd imagine a quick fall into the water wouldn't kill the phone... Love the color too.
customer_reviews.author: Runs4Fun

customer_reviews.title: Otterbox DEFENDER iPhone 6/6s
customer_reviews.text: This OtterBox is exactly what I was looking for. It fits the iPhone as it should. It is relatively easy to put on the phone as well as take off. I feel very confident in the protection it gives. Its design is perfect for the rugged user. If you drop your phone a lot, or are worried about breaking your screen, this case is definitely for you. It comes in a variety of colors, but I chose Gray/White. I like neutral colors and this case has the perfect combination of both colors.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany bullard

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: It's SO good to be back in an Otter Box case again. Bought a Lifeproof Fre' from the Verizon store when I got the phone - that was a $90 mistake. What a pice of junk that was - and the company's warranty service was no better. I still have an iPhone 4s in an Otter Box case that I use as an iPod - case and iPhone are still in "like new" condition. This DEFENDER case is great for my iPhone 6 in every way the Lifeproof isn't - access to ports, responsiveness to touch screen, looks, features - highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rich R.

customer_reviews.title: this is great
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my wife after she dropped her iPhone 6 and cracked the glass on it. This is much superior to the OtterBox "defenders" I had used to have on my older phones. While it is not waterproof, it certainly looks like it is nearly so. I've been a fan of otterBox for years and this one is the best so far. NOW IF only they had this for the 6PLUS in Denver Bronco colors.
customer_reviews.author: James R.

customer_reviews.title: Great protection for your investment
customer_reviews.text: Great case so far. I've already dropped my phone several times from 3-4 feet high, and this case managed to protect my iPhone as expected. No cracked screen, no scratches. Love the convenient belt clip as well. FYI, if you plan on using a tempered glass screen protector, then this case won't fit unless you remove the screen cover on the otterbox. After removing the OtterBox's screen cover, it will fit your iPhone + tempered glass screen protector with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Protection
customer_reviews.text: I gave my son my old phone and needed a new, sturdier case. This case is amazing. He has dropped the phone so many times and the case has protected it with each heart-wrenching drop. He loved the Call of Duty logo and couldn’t wait to show it off. It is bulky, especially with the cover which he almost never uses. It does require a smaller/narrower “tip” on the charging cable (the AmazonBasics braided cable is too big to fit the space for the charging port.) I wish it had been a little less expensive since it is an old phone.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Rugged case. Attractive. Good protection for those us who drop our phone frequently.
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly. All the buttons are easy to depress with case on. Touch pad works just as if the screen protector was not there. I like the port covers- easy to open and keeps them clean when not in use. Came with holster which is very handy while I'm running errands with just my wallet and phone. Case makes holding onto my phone much easier and is great for arthritic hands. This is a great product.. highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: ShoeLover9989

customer_reviews.title: My iPhone didn't react to touch as I should inside this case, but Otterbox corrected the problem.
customer_reviews.text: **Edited after being contacted by Otterbox. I originally gave the case 2 stars because my phone's touchscreen didn't respond as it should while inside this case. I've purchased Otterbox Defenders for my phones in the past and were very happy with them. Otterbox responded to my review shortly after it posted instructing me to call Otterbox. I did and they couldn't have been apologetic and helpful. They offered to send me a replacement. The new Otterbox Defender arrived yesterday and my iPhone responds perfectly inside the case. I love Otterbox again. Their Customer Service is top notch.
customer_reviews.author: dlbale

customer_reviews.title: Best phone protector hands down!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t give this enough stars. Best phone protector on the market, hands down. My phone is used by my 2 year old often, and has been dropped multiple times, and has always been perfectly fine. It’s at the point where it doesn’t even cross my mind that something may have broken when it gets dropped - it is THAT protective. Great design and I love the grey color as opposed to the black. Thanks for the great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tabetha CB

customer_reviews.title: Useless if you work construction
customer_reviews.text: Product is great for about a week. I work construction in very dusty environments. My phone stays in my pocket unless I’m using it which is pretty rarely. Every couple of days dust fills the inside of the case, covering the phone. I don’t expect it to be 100 percent sealed, but this is useless. I have to take it apart and clean everything once or twice a week. And then of course taking apart the case that often causes all the little clips that hold it together to break. So now I’m in the market for a new case from a company that actually makes a quality product, because otter box does not make a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend to all I phone users to protect phones
customer_reviews.text: Finally a box that will protect my new I-Phone and is able to close the charging unit which other boxes don't have. I already had a protective screen on this phone and this Otter Box comes with its own protective screen. I did not take off the one that was already on my phone, and now I have two protective screens. first thought phone would not work with two screen, but it works fine. Otter box very durable, can drop phone and it does not affect it.
customer_reviews.author: ORCHIDLADY1

customer_reviews.title: Great Case
customer_reviews.text: Great case! This is my second time buying this. The first time it lasted 3 years. The camo part started peeling off so I finally had to replace it with this one. I had the inner part of the case crack at some point but I just changed out that piece for a different color front(from an extra case) I've been happy with this case, it has protected my phone perfectly. I have dropped it many times and the phone is still in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but bulky and hard to type on.
customer_reviews.text: Product works well, but feels really heavy. After holding onto my phone on the couch, my fingers start to hurt after 3-4 minutes. It’s also moderately difficult to type with since you have to smack the screen really hard. It would also be nice if the rubber outer case wasn’t attached during shipping, so I wouldn’t have to hurt the durability of it while unboxing. Not great, not horrible, and should get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This OtterBox is great for protecting your phone
customer_reviews.text: This OtterBox is great for protecting your phone. I have dropped mine and this case protected it from anything happening to it. It is very durable and long-lasting. Definitely will be sticking with this OtterBox if anything happens to this one. It does get dirty inside and the protective cover can get scratched but just clean it and at least it isn't the screen getting scratched on the actual phone so this doesn't really bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Hchrist07

customer_reviews.title: This is a great case, just not the color I expected
customer_reviews.text: I will be a life long fan of otter box defenders and felt so lucky I could find one for the iPhone 6. The color on the listing is a teal but when I received it was more of Cerulean. I understand there’s always color differences but this was a bit of a disparity. Oh well, I was just a bit disappointed because it was a guy and the color is a bit girly for him lol
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Rugged and reliable
customer_reviews.text: The Otterbox Defender has saved me -- well, my phone actually -- many, many, MANY times. Used my last one until it basically came apart. This one is every bit as good. Pros: Very rugged, reasonably attractive. Cons: Bulky and not sexy. I'm good with that. I'm not counting on my phone case to be a chick magnet. I wish it were more water resistant, but it doesn't claim to to be, so I have no real complaint there.
customer_reviews.author: David Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price you pay.
customer_reviews.text: This is a rugged case, and for the price it's exactly what you want. However, the color wasn't as red as it looks in the picture. It was more of a pinkish-orange. It gets dirty quickly too. Also, the portion of the screen cover that covers the home button on my particular case is a little crooked. Not a big deal, but it's definitely noticable. And lastly, the cover for the charging cable is harder to get out than usual. I have a Defender case for my work phone and this one is definitely harder to open. It's actually peeling apart from having to pry it open with my fingernails.
customer_reviews.author: devin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Phone Case.  Economical, Well Built and Easy to Grip
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the product. This is my 2nd OtterBox case. The first one was used on my previous iPhone 5s. This one fits like a glove on my Iphone6s, and have not had any issues with it so far. The 1st case I owned, I had a tempered glass placed on the screen, under the case. This one, I have not added the tempered glass screen. If the plastic screen protector on the case gets where I cannot view my screen (scratched), I may consider adding one. Otherwise, I have been very pleased with the Otterbox cases, where my phone has not been damaged from falls or transport.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone case!
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace my OtterBox Defender as it was over 2 years old, because with daily use the port covers eventually begin to wear out. This pink and white OtterBox came in perfect condition and I'm very glad I ordered it. I have never paid full retail for an OtterBox - they're about $60 from many retailers - so this is a fabulous bargain. My family and I have always had this type of OtterBox on our iPhones and all of them have remained in pristine condition despite being dropped.
customer_reviews.author: AppleGeek

customer_reviews.title: Good protection
customer_reviews.text: Looks very sturdy. Be aware that it is a little bulky compared to other phone protectors and is very hard to open specially if you have a manicure, you can actually ruin your nails so ask someone to open the case for you. Also if dust gets trapped inside is a pain to open and clean that. I still love this brand and keeps our devices safe.
customer_reviews.author: Adam and Sue White

customer_reviews.title: Another great Otterbox product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, perfect fit, would highly recommend this product. We've had a few of these and they do the job. I know they're a little bulkier than some but we've dropped our phones several times on concrete and tile with no damage to them. The only weakness in the system is that the holster is more likely to break a couple of times during the period you have the case. So far, they've been easy and relatively cheap to replace, the holsters are a little dorky but come in real handy.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: OtterBox Case vs. car tire
customer_reviews.text: This case is unbelievable! Yesterday, after returning from a dog walk, I found that my phone was missing. However, I didn't realize this until after I had returned from a car trip. Looked all over, suspended the phone, and hours later finally found it. I had dropped it in our driveway, face down. The tire treads were visible but with no other noticeable marks. I reactivated the phone, and it works!! Camera works as well. This was the most expensive case that I have ever purchased, and worth every penny. Loyal to this brand forever! The marks on the phone have worn off but may be visible in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Protects phone from drops as expected
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this for a couple months now. I had to remove the plastic screen/fingerprint cover, because my touch screen didn’t work with it on. I dropped my phone once while using this case, and my phone was undamaged. This biggest problem I have is that many phone chargers now won’t fit with the case on.
customer_reviews.author: luckymama

customer_reviews.title: excellent protection
customer_reviews.text: Excellent protection for your iPhone. I have used this version of the Otterbox on every iPhone I have owned and have dropped my phone numerous times without any damage to the phone. All the phone buttons work great through the case and there are closable openings in the case for the charger and ear phones. I returned it for a black one. I wanted to try a brighter color, but in the end I prefer the black.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Snyder

customer_reviews.title: New style?
customer_reviews.text: Seems like they might've changed something. I replaced both my work and personal iPhones with this case. Both had older defender cases on them. The plastic screen protector on both won't stay tight to the phone so it creates a bubble feeling sometimes and can make using the phone frustrating. That being said, my phones have lasted being dropped off ladders at work and everything my toddler can throw at it at home.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good case
customer_reviews.text: Good case4 month’s. Lasted four months. I’ve probably dropped from waist high about 5 times, and now it’s broken. Don’t get me wrong; it protected the phone. and there is no cure-all solution. I still like the case style and will order another. Still, the plastic could be more shockproof/resilient to bouncing on the floor from waist high.
customer_reviews.author: Objective Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Otterbox
customer_reviews.text: I love Otterbox. I bought this for my dad who needed a new case. It's great. It protects your device from falls up to 6 feet, which he's done before. The case is a rubber like material and is slip resistant. It's very easy to put on your device. And the belt clip is included (but check descriptions becasuse some sellers don't include in. Otterbox company does). If you're looking for a great protective device case, this is your product!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Requested
customer_reviews.text: My two daughters have used these cases for a few years now. They requested new ones to replace their old ones. After many, many drops and kicks and spills and nefarious things, the cases were pretty beat up, but the phones on the inside were spotless. I have not had to replace a screen once since they have used these cases. I think they are worth a little extra.
customer_reviews.author: ScholDaddy

customer_reviews.title: Like everything about this product
customer_reviews.text: Like everything about this product, especially how the screen protector seems to have to bearing on the touch sensitivity and there's no sensation . Just be aware that if you're using a charging cord from an earlier IPhone, the 5S in my case, you may find that the cable connector is too wide to fit into the space Otterbox allows for the recharging port. But it was quick and easy fix: I reduced the width of the connector by carefully using a file (taking a little material off each side of the cable connector) to get it to fit. There was plenty of excess plastic, so no harm done.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph L. Penza

customer_reviews.title: Great design, but...
customer_reviews.text: Okay so this product gets three stars only for one HUGE reason. Now the 6 and 6s are designed for use with your fingerprint to open the phone, this case makes that impossible. This case has a plastic film over the home button, I realize this is to protect from dirt, minimal amounts of water, etc. but it makes use of the home button with your fingerprint nearly impossible. The moment I got home from the phone store I ripped this film off and the case has been great ever since, great design, but the little things make a major difference.
customer_reviews.author: James R.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone case
customer_reviews.text: I have used otter box in the past but had switched to Lifeproof for the last couple of years. Lifeproof has a warranty where if the case is damaged you can get a replacement, but I was replacing it way too frequently which spoke to the quality. This case is cute and was a great price. Perfect for those wanting to add some extra protection to their phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Otter Box Defender series case for iPhone 6  6s
customer_reviews.text: This Otter Box Deffender is the best Military style jet black color .Four layers of protection ,Drop protection ,Dustprotection, Scratch Protection,Screen protection and has a belt clip Holder that you can you can use as a stand for viewing Netflix,YouTube etc.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen  S

customer_reviews.title: Best case ever!
customer_reviews.text: I switched from a different type of otter case just c it was white and super dirty and scuffed up and glad I did - this thing is awesome!!!! I had to watch a YouTube video to figure out how to get t apart and even then I struggled for a bit but that’s bc it’s tough to keep your phone together and safe. I bought the red with like some silverish -white color and I love it. My toddler likes to throw my phone once in awhile and I am very clumsy myself and this is the best case I think I’ve ever had for any phOne— which there has been many lol. Love!
customer_reviews.author: KaitlynTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: but I don't think you can get any better protection to thickness ratio than this
customer_reviews.text: Holds up well to the constant abuse given to it by myself and my kids. I have dropped it countless times down concrete stairs and it stands strong against repeated launches across the grocery store from my toddlers. Only down size is its thickness, but I don't think you can get any better protection to thickness ratio than this. I much prefer it to the different lifeproof cases I've tried. This is my second case, I'm sure it won't be my last.
customer_reviews.author: xkontour98

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It's an Otterbox. It's protects. My mom has the iPhone 6 one--not iPhone 6s. I just got my phone today but OB (defenders) have never let me down in the past. My previous iPhones are in the drawer both in OB def. cases. Lol Wished the prices for the other colors had been cheaper though. Didn't get the pink because my mom had that one and didn't want black. Kinda glad I didn't get real, though. But I wish there was a light purple or lavender. I might get a skin later. Either way it looks smooth, sleek & it's protected.
customer_reviews.author: Tierra

product_meta.title: OtterBox DEFENDER iPhone 6/6s Case - Retail Packaging - BLACK
product_meta.description: Style:Single| Color:BLACK| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingThe OtterBox Defender Series case for Apple iPhone 6/6s provides heavy duty protection against drops, dust and damage without taking away from the usability of your phone's features. The Defender Series case offers triple-layer protection and is built from a high-impact polycarbonate shell, durable silicone slipcover and a built-in screen protector, making it one of the toughest cases on the market. Why else do you think we called it the Defender Series?
feature_bullets: Robust, 3-layer protective case, with a built-in screen protector, withstands scratches, drops, bumps and shock
Belt-clip holster included that doubles as a kickstand for hands-free media viewing
Port covers keep out dust and debris - May not be compatible with 30-pin to Lightning Adapters or non-Apple branded USB to Lightning cables
Includes OtterBox limited lifetime warranty (see website for details) and 100% authentic

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars18,940 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
